item.title: Notes on Mathematical Proofs
item.description: Logic Truth table Direct proof Relation Complete Order Partial Order Space Distance Cauchy-Schwarz Inequality Set Collection & Operation Proof by Logic (twice if unlucky) Proof by \(B_Îµ\) Set Close / Open Closure & Interior & Boundary Convex Maximum & Supremum Dense Function Range / Image Injection & Surjection Continuous Limit & Differenciation Supremum & Infimum Concave & Convex Epigraph Set \(\times\) Function Injection & Surjection (revisited) Finite & Countable Sequence (Un-)bounded Convergent Limit & Cluster Point Set \(\times\) Sequence Wrote by a MSc student dying of end-of-term reviews (a.
